span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 贬低，轻蔑地说： to lower in rank or reputation; to speak of in a slighting or disrespectful way; belittle
【例】 use the past to disparage the present 借古讽今
【例】Voters don't like political advertisements in which opponents disparage one another.
【近】 belittle, denigrate, deprecate, depreciate, derogate, degrade
【反】 acclaim, applaud, exalt, extol, glorify, laud 赞扬
【记】 dis 否定 + paragon 模范, 否定模范人物→ (当模范不易啊，经常受人白眼,)蔑视, 贬损
